default.title: Unexpected error
default.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please, reload the page.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: 404 - The page you were looking for unfortunately does not exist.

axiosError.title: Server error
axiosError.description: An error occurred while handling the request. Please, try again.
axiosError.correlationIdText: If the error persists, open a request to support. Provide the context information and the code shown below.

forbidden.title: Unauthorized
forbidden.description: You do not have the necessary permissions to view the page.

tokenExchange.title: Authentication error
tokenExchange.description: Please, return to the Members Area and try logging in again

assistencePartySelection.title: Error: unauthorized
assistencePartySelection.description: You do not have the necessary permissions to view PDND in assistance mode, or the session has expired. Please try logging in again from Google Workspace.
